data.title: National Film Award for Best Feature Film in Telugu
data.meta_description: The National Film Award for Best Feature Film in Telugu Cinema winners: The awards received by the films released in the previous year are listed below. [1] Contents 1 Silver Lotus Award 2 Certificate of Merit 3
data.text:
National Film Award for Best Feature Film — Award Information Type National Category Movies Instituted 1954 First Awarded 1954 Last Awarded 2010 Total Awarded 56 … Wikipedia

National Film Award for Best Feature Film in Tamil — The following lists the National Film Award (Silver Lotus Award) for Best Feature Film in Tamil. The year in the header refers to the date when the film was censored and submitted for the awards, without of regard of when the award was presented … Wikipedia

National Film Award for Best Feature Film in Hindi — The National Film Award (Silver Lotus Award) for Best Feature Film in Hindi awards the best regional film in Hindi language. Initially the award was known as the President s Silver Medal for Best Feature Film in Hindi. The winners in this… … Wikipedia
